name: Snorkelling in Andamans
description:
Snorkelling in Andamans offer an experience that is very much synonymic to fairy tales or any other childhood fantasies. Diving and swimming underwater amidst the many species of fishes and exotic coral reefs has its own delight and flamboyance, and can never be replaced with any other water activities.

South Button and Tamarind Camp are two of the most popular islets of Ritchie’s Archipelago Islands in the Andamans. While the clear aqua body and the rich marine life of South Button makes it an ideal destination for Snorkelling, Tamarind Camp boasts of its exquisite and scenic landscapes and beachside.

This tour allows the visitors and the Snorkelling enthusiasts to fulfill their dream of diving with the shoals of fishes and explore the enchanting beauty of the coral world.
